xbrlcore.instance
Class InstanceValidator

java.lang.Object
  xbrlcore.instance.InstanceValidator

public class InstanceValidator
extends java.lang.Object

The purpose of this class is to do some basic instance (XBRL) validation. Currently, the class is incomplete since it does not perform a full validation, but it will be extended in the future.

Author:
Daniel Hamm

Constructor Summary
InstanceValidator(java.io.File instanceFile)
           
InstanceValidator(Instance instance)
          Constructor.
 
Method Summary
 void schemaValidation()
          Validates an instance file against the DTS by using only XML Schema (no additional XBRL validation is performed).
 void validate()
          Performs all validations this class offers.
 void validateCalculation(Fact fact)
          Performs a validation of only one fact of the instance against the calculation linkbase of the taxonomy.
 void validateCalculations()
          Performs a full validation of the instance against the calculation linkbase of the taxonomy.

Method Detail

schemaValidation

public void schemaValidation()
                      throws org.jdom.JDOMException,
                             XBRLException,
                             java.io.IOException,
                             java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
Validates an instance file against the DTS by using only XML Schema (no additional XBRL validation is performed).

Throws:
org.jdom.JDOMException
XBRLException
java.io.IOException
java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException

validate

public void validate()
              throws InstanceValidationException,
                     XBRLException
Performs all validations this class offers. Currently, this is just the validation against the calculation linkbase (NO XML Schema validation is performed).

Throws:
InstanceValidationException
XBRLException

validateCalculations

public void validateCalculations()
                          throws InstanceValidationException,
                                 CalculationValidationException,
                                 XBRLException
Performs a full validation of the instance against the calculation linkbase of the taxonomy.

Throws:
InstanceValidationException
CalculationValidationException
XBRLException

validateCalculation

public void validateCalculation(Fact fact)
                         throws InstanceValidationException,
                                CalculationValidationException,
                                XBRLException
Performs a validation of only one fact of the instance against the calculation linkbase of the taxonomy.

Parameters:
fact - Fact which is validated against the calculation linkbase.
Throws:
InstanceValidationException
CalculationValidationException
XBRLException
